Historians

Professor Schama is calling for a return to a “golden age” of historians of the calibre of Gibbon, Macaulay and Carlyle. He says modern-day historians – with a few notable exceptions – have lost the ability to inspire the public with tales of the past in the same way as their predecessors. Which brings to mind C.L.R.
